parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="qm_environmentsettings">
    <attribute name="qm_environmentsettingsid" />
    <attribute name="qm_name" />
    <attribute name="qm_value" />
    <order attribute="qm_name" descending="false" />
    <filter type="and">
      <condition attribute="qm_name" operator="like" value="%CID[_]%" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false">
  <entity name="ovs_operationunnumber">
    <attribute name="ovs_name" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <attribute name="ovs_operationunnumberid" />
    <order attribute="ovs_name" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="account" from="accountid" to="cid_site" link-type="inner" alias="ac">
      <filter type="and">
        <condition attribute="parentaccountid" operator="eq" value="{1D9E47DF-6BF3-46BF-A129-268F5521C601}" />
      </filter>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

inputs.body:
First of two sets of validations of the file being uploaded is now complete. The workbook contains @{outputs('Number-Of-Sites')}​ rows of Site data and @{outputs('Number-of-UNs')} rows of UN # data related to those Sites that are ready to be added or updated within CID for your Company.
Do you want continue with the Bulk Upload process?

  • @{outputs('Number-Of-Sites')} # of Sites in the Add Basic sheet.
  • @{outputs('Number-of-UNs')} # of UN # rows in the Add Extended sheet.

There are already @{length(outputs('List_All_sites')?['body'])} rows of Site data and @{length(outputs('List_All_Un_numbers')?['body'])} rows of UN data for those sites on file for this Company, so no further uploads can continue.

inputs.name: Error_Message
inputs.value: There are already @{outputs('Number-Of-Listed-Sites')} rows of Site data and @{outputs('Number-Of-UN-Listed')} rows of UN data for those sites on file for this Company, so no further uploads can continue. [ B1007]

inputs.name: Logged_Error_Message
inputs.value: Error - Bulk Site Registration Upload: CID for this Company has too many rows of Sites data @{length(outputs('List_All_sites')?['body'])} and/or rows of UN data  @{length(outputs('List_All_Un_numbers')?['body'])}, versus limits of @{outputs('Max-system-sites')} and @{outputs('Max-System-UNnumbers')}.[B1007]

inputs.body: Error - Bulk Site Registration Upload: Workbook has too many rows of Sites data @{outputs('Number-Of-Sites')} and/or rows of UN data @{outputs('Number-of-UNs')}, versus limits of @{outputs('Max-Workbook-sites')} and @{outputs('Max-Workbook-UNnumbers')}.

inputs.name: Error_Message
inputs.value:
This workbook contains rows of Site data @{outputs('Number-Of-Sites')} and @{outputs('Number-of-UNs')} rows of UN data for those sites. This exceeds the acceptable limits for the bulk upload of @{outputs('Max-Workbook-sites')} rows for Site data and @{outputs('Max-Workbook-UNnumbers')} rows for UN data.
The [Instructions] tab within the workbook provides guidance as to what data needs to be provided. If need be, you may consider splitting the file into two Bulk files, each under the limits, and two Bulk submissions. [B1006]

inputs.name: Logged_Error_Message
inputs.value: Error - Bulk Site Registration Upload: Workbook has too many rows of Sites data @{outputs('Number-Of-Sites')} and/or rows of UN data @{outputs('Number-of-UNs')}, versus limits of @{outputs('Max-Workbook-sites')} and @{outputs('Max-Workbook-UNnumbers')}. [B1006]

inputs.body:
The uploaded file is empty. Please update the file with the Basic, and if required Extended, Site information, Guidance for the data entry can be found in the [Instructions] sheet of the workbook.  
When that process is complete, then upload that version of the file.

inputs.name: Error_Message
inputs.value:
The uploaded file is empty. Please update the file with the Basic, and if required Extended, Site information, Guidance for the data entry can be found in the [Instructions] sheet of the workbook.
When that process is complete, then upload that version of the file.[B1005]

inputs.name: Logged_Error_Message
inputs.value: Error - Bulk Site Registration Upload: Workbook’s hidden company and version is correct, but the user did not enter any data. [B1005]

inputs.body: The uploaded file is assigned to the @{outputs('CompanyName-fromSetting_')} Company, versus your own Company. Please download and update a new version of the Site Bulk Upload Excel Template, then upload that file instead.

inputs.name: Error_Message
inputs.value:
The uploaded file is assigned to the @{outputs('CompanyName-fromSetting_')} Company, versus your own Company. Please download and update a new version of the Site Bulk Upload Excel Template, then upload that file instead.
 @{outputs('CompanyName-fromSetting_')} is the name of Company Name stored in a hidden field in the workbook

inputs.name: Logged_Error_Message
inputs.value: Error - Bulk Site Registration Upload: File for a different Company. [B1003]

headers.Error: "The uploaded file is based on a template that is no longer current. Please download and update a new version of the Site Bulk Upload Excel Template, then upload that file instead. "

inputs.body: The uploaded file is based on a template that is no longer current. Please download and update a new version of the Site Bulk Upload Excel Template, then upload that file instead.

inputs.name: Error_Message
inputs.value: The uploaded file is based on a template that is no longer current. Please download and update a new version of the Site Bulk Upload Excel Template, then upload that file instead. [B1004]

inputs.name: Logged_Error_Message
inputs.value: Error - Bulk Site Registration Upload: File’s version of  @{outputs('get_the_version_#')?['body/value'][0]?['version Number']} is less than the current minimum file version @{outputs('version-number')}. [B1004]

inputs.body: The uploaded file is not the custom Site Bulk Upload Excel workbook. Please download and update a new version of the Site Bulk Upload Excel Template, then upload that file instead.

inputs.name: Error_Message
inputs.value: The uploaded file is not the custom Site Bulk Upload Excel workbook. Please download and update a new version of the Site Bulk Upload Excel Template, then upload that file instead.

inputs.name: Logged_Error_Message
inputs.value: Error - Bulk Site Registration Upload: File is not a Site Bulk Upload Excel workbook. [B1002]
